verbs.description: Farmers [V: are] pressuring Congress for a compromise with China to avert a costly trade war . The Trump administration is showing signs of compromise .
[ARG0: Farmers] are [V: pressuring] [ARG1: Congress] [ARG2: for a compromise with China to avert a costly trade war] . The Trump administration is showing signs of compromise .
Farmers are pressuring Congress for a compromise with China to [V: avert] [ARG1: a costly trade war] . The Trump administration is showing signs of compromise .
Farmers are pressuring Congress for a compromise with China to avert a costly trade war . The Trump administration [V: is] showing signs of compromise .
Farmers are pressuring Congress for a compromise with China to avert a costly trade war . [ARG0: The Trump administration] is [V: showing] [ARG1: signs of compromise] .
